price: Lalle ne Mũ, Mũ ne ke gãdon ƙasa* da wanda yake a kanta, kuma zuwa gare Mu ake mayar da su.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: *Tun da yake Mũ ke gãdon ƙasa da wanda yake a cikinta,bã zã Mu yi bukãtar sãmun wani magãji ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
